ip: servant of King Artasirsis there to city of Susa. Taheed of there sikandin, nakarawat sikandin of story concerning the me Israilita nekewun‑a nekeuli bad the living. Nakasasindeg e the temple but not yet naay-ayari the matikang and makepal alad of city, sikan naa the ware egpakaatang of enemies of me Israilita nakalingut them.

meta.ip: Tenged dutu, migbuyu Nihimiyas of pegtuhut of King eggendiye of Yerusalem so that egbalew-balew egpasasindeg of me matikang and makepal alad here.
Egkabasa ta again of this libru ke immenu of God of helping ki Nihimiyas of pegbalew-balew pegsasindeg of matikang and makepal alad of city taliware of pegbalabag of enemies dan nakalingut them.
